title: Actions
content:
become Invisible

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage.

Attack Rolls against you have Disadvantage, and you have Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

Play a tune to attract and delight those around you.

This action can be performed when a Musical Instrument is equipped.

Shoot an enemy to damage them that possibly left a Gaping Wounds.(Undead and Constructs can't get Gaping Wounds)

Inflicts Gaping WoundsAttack/Save: Ranged Attack, Constit
